categories: Category:Events during the New Republic Era

nodes.text: During the era of the New Republic, a team of mercenaries and a bounty hunter led by Migs Mayfeld launched a mission to rescue Qin from a New Republic Correctional Transport, the Bothan-Five. After Qin was successfully liberated from his holding cell, the group attempted to betray one of their members, the Mandalorian bounty hunter Din Djarin, by locking him in the cell due to altercations between him and the rest of the group in the time leading up to the rescue mission. Din managed to escape confinement and locked the three mercenaries who betrayed him in a cell before escaping the prison ship with Qin.
